articles.description: Southampton make the perfect start to life back in the EFL thanks to Che Adams' late winner at promoted Sheffield Wednesday.
articles.title: Southampton open new season with win at Sheff Wed

articles.description: Bayern Munich tell Tottenham they want a decision on whether they are prepared to sell Harry Kane by the end of Friday.
articles.title: Bayern give Tottenham Friday Kane deadline

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says he weighed up his Arsenal future after last season's title blow before a "big reflection" convinced him to stay on.
articles.title: Arteta questioned his Arsenal future after title blow

articles.description: Watch the plays of the day following two tightly contested matches in The Hundred between Southern Brave and Welsh Fire at the Ageas Bowl.
articles.title: Jordan's six-hitting onslaught - The Hundred plays of the day

articles.description: BBC Sport's football expert Rachel Brown-Finnis gives her predictions for the last-16 matches at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Brown-Finnis' World Cup predictions for last-16 matches

articles.description: Andy Murray's defeat to Taylor Fritz is interrupted by climate protesters at the Citi Open in Washington.
articles.title: Climate protest interrupts Murray loss in Washington

articles.description: The Commonwealth Games is in crisis - seeking hosts for the 2026 and 2030 editions after Victoria and Alberta's withdrawals. So what happens next?
articles.title: Will there be another Commonwealth Games?

articles.description: England's World Cup countdown begins with their first warm-up match against Wales in Cardiff on Saturday - which players can force their way into the final squad?
articles.title: World Cup places at stake as England face Wales

articles.description: Great Britain win three golds and three silvers in a thrilling start to Friday's evening session at the Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: GB win three golds and three silvers at Worlds

articles.description: Chris Jordan smashes an unbeaten 70 off 32 balls as Southern Brave beat Welsh Fire by two runs in a Hundred thriller.
articles.title: Jordan's explosive hitting helps Brave beat Fire
